Giving                                          Home / Services                         Information Technology Systems                                                             Information Technology Systems                       The School of Engineering's Information Technology department is your resource for resolving and troubleshooting computing issues such as resetting passwords, establishing e-mail accounts, and retrieving lost laptop data.      In addition to helping students, faculty, and staff resolve Institute-related technology issues, Information Systems is responsible for maintaining the underlying technology infrastructure for the School of Engineering, including our computer and telecommunications network.   Help Desk   e-mail, OneCard, desktop, and network services      337 Rogers Hall   Monday – Friday: 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.   24-Hour Phone Support: 718-260-3123    help@poly.edu   Laptop Help Desk   laptop hardware and software services      339 Rogers Hall   Monday – Friday: 9:00 a.m. – 4:45 p.m. (regular hours)   Monday – Friday: 10:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. (summer hours)   718-260-3368    notebook@poly.edu                                Information Technology Systems      Laptop + Desktop Support   E-mail Systems + Support   OneCard   Wired, Wireless, Phone   Computer Lab   Help Guides   Forms + Policies   Purchases   People   Quick Support                                    Engineering is NYU  Follow Us:  Facebook Twitter Vimeo YouTube        Undergraduate   Admissions   How to Apply   Apply Now   admissions@nyu.edu   Graduate   Admissions   Requirements   Apply Now   engineering.gradinfo@nyu.edu   Site Links   Press   Directory   Directions   Event Calendar   Careers/HR   Support    Email/Network help@poly.edu Website Report a Problem Login (Faculty + Staff)  NYU School of Engineering 6 MetroTech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201 Tel: 718.260.3600 Fax: 718.260.3136 © NYU School of Engineering
